ChunkText: enter the address of the office where you physically go to work each day, even if it is different than the address of the hiring company.
ContextBefore: if you left an employer, add last day you worked. do not delete any entries! if you work for one employer but are contracted to another: enter the name of the company that has legally hired you.
ContextAfter: in the comments section of the portal, please write the following: company contracted to: xxxxxxxx address of hiring company: xxxxxxx remember: you cannot enter an employer start date that is more than ten days before today. help! i am getting an error and i cannot enter my employer information in sevp portal. what do i do?
